activity.title: Activity 2
activity.instructions: Read the conversation between two colleagues. Then click on the best word(s) to complete each statement.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.reader: Mieko: Hey, Noor. I need to pick up a few things on the way back to the hotel. Feel like stopping at a cosmetics store? We could get some of that makeup these gorgeous Brazilians wear. Noor: I’d like to, but I think I’ll pass. I don’t have much time today. I’m expecting an important call from Kuala Lumpur in a few minutes. Mieko: No problem. I’ll just go myself. But wish me luck. I’m sure no one speaks Japanese! Noor: Don’t worry. Most people speak some English. You’ll be fine. Mieko: I guess. In any case, the store’s self-service. It’ll be a piece of cake! Noor: See you back at the hotel.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
